item.title: US Stock Crypto Stocks Showing Mixed Performance, BNC Up 20%, Trump-Related ALTS, ABTC Up Around 15%
item.description: On September 6th, based on market data, the U.S. stock market closed on Friday. The Dow dropped by 0.48%, the S&P 500 decreased by 0.32%, and the Nasdaq fell by 0.03%. Crypto stocks witnessed mixed trends, including:Coinbase (COIN) declined by 2.52%, with a trading volume of $34.09 billion.Circle (CRCL) went down by 2.49%, and the trading volume was $12.92 billion.MicroStrategy (MSTR) rose by 2.53% (and fell by 2.9% after hours), and the trading volume was $46.55 billion.Bullish (BLSH) increased by 6.81%, with a trading volume of $2.21 billion.Bitmine (BMNR) dropped by 0.36%, and the trading volume was $17.79 billion.BTCS (BTCS) fell by 0.94%, with a trading volume of $14.0556 million.SharpLink Gaming (SBET) decreased by 3.21%, and the trading volume was $4.46 billion.BNB Network Company (BNC) rose by 20.09%, with a trading volume of $7.4693 million.ALT5 Sigma (ALTS) rose by 13.57%, with a trading volume of $78.3698 million.The Trump family's mining enterprise Ameri

item.title: The largest ENA holding address on Hyperliquid has a long position of over 5x, currently showing a unrealized gain of $3.1 million.
item.description: On September 6th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), due to the Ethena Foundation's buyback plan, ENA witnessed a price increase of more than 13% in the past 24 hours. The largest holder on Hyperliquid ENA, with the address 0x6b7...c5e9c, has a long position that is more than 5 times and has a realized profit of $3.107 million.This address has been holding a long position in ENA since July 29th. Currently, it holds 49.18 million tokens (approximately $36.63 million) with an average entry price of $0.6804.BlockBeats previously reported that Ethena announced early this morning a $530 million additional "StablecoinX" PIPE transaction, and the foundation launched a new $310 million open market buyback plan.

item.title: The SEC Delays Decision on the Grayscale DOT Spot ETF
item.description: On September 6th, according to official channels, the SEC has postponed its decision regarding the Grayscale Polkadot (DOT) spot ETF application.

item.title: A whale that participated in an ETH ICO has transferred a total of 3500 ETH to OKX over the past 3 days.
item.description: On September 6th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), the "ETH ICO Whale with 1 million ETH" had accumulated 2000 ETH on September 2nd. In the past three days, a total of 3500 ETH has been deposited to OKX, with a total value of $15.11 million.At that time, the price at which they withdrew ETH from Kraken was $4396.23. If this transaction was truly a buy-in, they would have incurred a loss of $155,000.

item.title: SOL Strategies has been approved for listing and will debut on Nasdaq next week
item.description: On September 6th, the Canadian blockchain company SOL Strategies has obtained listing approval and is scheduled to make its Nasdaq debut next week.In a notice issued on Friday, SOL Strategies declared that its common stock will commence trading on the Nasdaq Global Select Market starting from September 9th, with the stock ticker symbol being STKE. This listing will bring an end to the company's stock trading on the OTCQB over-the-counter market, while still maintaining its trading activities on the Canadian Securities Exchange.After the Nasdaq announcement, the price of SOL Strategies on the Canadian Securities Exchange under the ticker symbol HODL witnessed a significant increase of approximately 20% on Friday.

item.title: An address deposited 14.53 million U to open a 2x SOL long position on Hyperliquid.
item.description: On September 6th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a whale address beginning with 0x560C deposited 14.53 million USDC into Hyperliquid 5 hours ago and initiated a 2x long position in SOL. The position size is 143,126 SOL and the position value is $29 million.

item.title: A whale address went long on ENA 3 hours ago, with a position size of 27.9 million ENA.
item.description: On September 6th, as monitored by LookOnChain, the whale address beginning with 0x9e8b, which had made a profit of over $14.5 million on Hyperliquid, went long on ENA three hours ago. The position size was 27.9 million ENA, valued at $20.5 million.Previously reported by BlockBeats, Ethena announced early this morning an additional "StablecoinX" PIPE transaction worth $530 million, and the foundation initiated a new $310 million open market buyback program.

item.title: A certain whale address chased the ETH price surge last night, losing $10.67 million, and then switched to shorting BTC, with a position worth $122 million.
item.description: On September 6th, as monitored by on-chain data analyst Yu Jin, a whale address. After losing $10.67 million by chasing the rise of ETH following last night's non-farm payroll data and suffering a total loss of $35.84 million in longing for ETH, it has now shifted to shorting BTC.After liquidating all its ETH long positions last night, over the past 5 hours, this address has been gradually shorting BTC. It has currently shorted 1,107 BTC with a position value of $122 million. The entry price is $111,390, the liquidation price is $116,824, and it currently has an unrealized profit of $830,000.

item.title: Robinhood (HOOD) Unexpectedly Included in S&P 500, Strategy (MSTR) Misses Out
item.description: On Friday, September 6th, Michael Saylor's Strategy (MSTR) failed to be included in the S&P 500 Index despite the company announcing strong quarterly earnings and meeting all the inclusion criteria. Consequently, MSTR dropped by 3% after hours, wiping out intraday gains.Unexpectedly, Robinhood (HOOD) was added to the S&P 500 Index, resulting in its stock price rising by 7% after the close. This adjustment will become effective on September 22nd.

item.title: The Federal Reserve Chair Candidate List Narrows to Three, Trump Reiterates Support for Hassett
item.description: On September 6th, President Trump of the United States stated on Friday that he is mulling over having the Director of the White House National Economic Council, Hassett, assume another role. Trump mentioned that he already has a good inkling of who he will select as the chairperson of the Federal Reserve, with Hassett being one of the three potential candidates. Nevertheless, he declined to confirm whether he would choose Hassett as the Federal Reserve chair. Trump declared that U.S. Treasury Secretary Bentsen was the fourth choice for the Federal Reserve chair, and currently, there are three remaining candidates. Wash and Walle are also among the potential candidates. (Jinse)
